primary.context: Caller wants to pay an outstanding balance of $660.72
primary.detail: The agent prepared the payment link but ended the call without confirming it was actually sent.

steps: Agent performed identity verification (name and state).
Agent looked up account details and confirmed property, contract, and balance.
Agent confirmed contact information for delivery.
Agent stated they were getting the link ready but ended the call before confirming the send action.

failure.detail: The agent ended the call after saying it would prepare the link, without confirming the link was sent.

actions.detail: Verified name Jamie Morla and state Virginia.
Agent prepared link but call ended before send confirmation.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to pay their balance. The agent successfully verified the account and confirmed details but disconnected before confirming the payment link was sent.
insights.verbatim: Let me get that payment link ready for you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
insights.coaching: The agent must confirm the link has been sent (e.g., 'I have sent that link to your email') before closing the call to ensure fulfillment.
